data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Magalhães, Wagner F., Bailey, Julie H., Brock, -, Davenport, Jennifer S. (2011): On the genus Raphidrilus Monticelli, 1910 (Polychaeta: Ctenodrilidae) with description of two new species. Zootaxa 2804: 1-14, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.277061
